channel.title: defjaf tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from defjaf.

item.description: It is the summer solstice so time for my annual reminiscence of seeing Sun Ra and Don Cherry celebrate the rising sun from Battery Park in Manhattan with @disquiet back in 1989. Perhaps one day I’ll make it out to Stonehenge with the druids. https://t.co/OqDn8sCDLA
@REasther What gauge are they baked in?
@kjhealy Publishers? (I grew up near Englewood Cliffs and would always drive past Prentice-Hall…)
@comiXology On the purchasing side, please let us select multiple comics for purchase before completing the sale (I.e., a basket!). And let us stay on exactly the same page after a purchase.

@jr_pritchard Lucky you! I just finished my exams — but I’ve still got project reports to mark.
@jr_pritchard I also note mild linguistic irony that I wrote “mark” and you wrote “grading”.
I was out of contact for five days, four of which were holiday or weekend, and it still took me over two hours to deal with all the accumulated emails and messages.
